programme.title: Misi Studi PT3 B.Inggeris Ep05
programme.desc: Part 4 of Paper 1 Question will be discussed which is short answer questions based on a comprehension text. Learn useful tools that will help in answering comprehensive questions.

programme.desc: In this episode will discuss the Paper 1, part 5 question which is the Matching/Gapped text question. Learn useful tools on how to find the best answer and how to rule out the distractor

programme.title: Misi Studi PT3 Matematik Ep05
programme.desc: Membincangkan soalan berkatan bab Bulatan tentang cara mencari jejari serta penerangan terperinci untuk menjawab soalan.

programme.title: Misi Studi PT3 Matematik Ep06
programme.desc: Membincangkan soalan Ungkapan Algebra serta soalan Laju dan Pecutan termasuk langkah yang mudah difahami untuk menyelesaikannya dengan mudah.

programme.title: Misi Studi PT3 Sains Ep05
programme.desc: Meneliti soalan sistem saraf manusia, mengenali jenis-jenis saraf dan perbezaannya.Kenali ciri-ciri alveolus dan adaptasi strukturnya. Turut dibincangkan tentang Elektrik dan Kemagnetan

programme.desc: Membincangkan soalan tentang pembelahan nuclear dan pereputan radioaktif, juga disertakan soalan berkaitan fenomena permukaan matahari seperti nyalaan dan suria.

programme.title: Rumah Angker Pondok Indah
programme.desc: A family is brutally murdered in their own house. Ever since then, their ghosts linger, terrorising every family that moves into the house. When a new family moves in, history repeats itself.

programme.desc: Separuh jiwa Sri tersimpan pada suaminya. Namun, setelah suaminya meninggal, Sri diganggu oleh pelbagai misteri yang membuatkan hidupnya porak-peranda.

programme.title: Ritual
programme.desc: After their car breaks down, four travellers seek refuge in an abandoned house. A ghost child awaits them.

programme.title: Kudzu Zombies
programme.desc: When an agrochemical company tests its latest pesticide, the folks of a small town in the American South are turned into zombies. It is left to crop duster pilot Lonnie to lead the survivors to safety.

programme.title: Setinggan
programme.desc: The inhabitants of a squatter settlement in Kuala Lumpur are haunted by the souls of Japanese soldiers perished during World War II.

programme.title: Mountain Gun Fight Zombies
programme.desc: Wannabe-tomb raiders Tiger and Pole have failed in their latest attempt. On the way home, they are suspected of being thieves and end up in the lock-up of a village overrun by zombies!

programme.title: Jailangkung
programme.desc: Two sisters try to figure out the mystery behind her father's coma, with the help of a puppet ghost, Jailangkung.

programme.title: Santet Kuntilanak
programme.desc: When her younger sister suffers a brutal death at the hands of 4 scoundrels, Maya wastes no time in using her witchcraft to exact revenge on each and every one of them, with the aid of her sister's ghost.

programme.title: The Unborn Child
programme.desc: A young couple faces their biggest fear as their little daughter starts having an imaginary friend, who turns out to be their dumped, unplanned pregnancy many years ago.

programme.title: Bercakap Dengan Jin S2 Ep13

programme.title: Busut Bonang
programme.desc: While investigating the death of Hassan, a local teacher, three people are attacked by an evil spirit called, Penunggu Busut.

programme.title: Sesat: Yang Sudah Pergi Jangan Dipanggil
programme.desc: Amara cuba untuk berhubung dengan arwah ayahnya untuk kali terakhir melalui upacara ritual yang akhirnya membinasakan diri sendiri.

programme.title: Pee Nak
programme.desc: Three young men have no choice but to receive their ordination to be monks at an old temple which is said to be cursed by the mythical Pee Nak spirit.

programme.title: Mighty Mike Ep04
programme.desc: A gust of wind sends Iris' hat onto the Mikkelsen's roof and Mike sees the chance to look like a hero. He borrows Stephan's drone but the remote control falls into the racoons' hands.

programme.title: Mighty Mike Ep05

programme.desc: The adventurous Madeline must use all of her wits to prevent the sale of her beloved school and home in Paris.

programme.title: A Fish Tale
programme.desc: A stuffed animal shows a little girl that love is a special kind of magic.

programme.title: Coneheads
programme.desc: Beldar and Prymaat leave the planet Remulak to prepare for an invasion of Planet Earth. But due to a malfunction, they quickly adapt to suburban life as a typical middle-class family.

programme.title: Adventures of a Boy Genius
programme.desc: A 12 year-old boy genius teams up with a quirky teacher to solve a crime and save his family from splitting up, all while trying to win over his first crush.

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight.

programme.title: Dr. Seuss' the Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Two bored children have their lives turned upside down when a talking cat comes to visit them.

programme.title: Terra Willy: Unexplored Planet

programme.title: Magic in the Water
programme.desc: A father and his two children rediscover the strength of the family bond during a magical summer vacation.

programme.title: Trouble
programme.desc: A pampered dog named Trouble must learn to live in the real world, while trying to escape from his former owner's greedy children.

programme.title: Bewitched

programme.title: The Little Vampire
programme.desc: Rudolph is a thirteen year old vampire whose clan is threatened by a notorious vampire hunter.

programme.title: Next Door Spy
programme.desc: Ten-year old Agathe-Christine, or simply AC, likes mysteries and from the basement in the building, where she has just moved in, she has established a small detective bureau.

programme.title: Swing Away
programme.desc: Following a meltdown, professional golfer Zoe travels to her grandparents' village in Greece. She meets and mentors a ten-year-old girl who is wants to become the next golf sensation.

programme.title: Treasure Hounds
programme.desc: Young Jack inherits a dog, Skipper, who can talk! After learning that his Grandpa left a priceless Spanish treasure hidden in the town, Jack and his friends are on the hunt!
